testsuite.name: FileServerTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent. ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Server started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 2 Enter filename: > test_purpose_test1.txt Enter name of the file to be saved on server: > The request was sent. 200 Response says that file is saved! ID = 7 Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 2 Enter filename: > test_purpose_test2.txt Enter name of the file to be saved on server: > test_purpose_newFile.txt The request was sent. 200 Response says that file is saved! ID = 8 Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_notExist.txt The request was sent. 404 The response says that this file is not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 2 Enter id: > 7511 The request was sent. 404 The response says that this file is not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_newFile.txt The request was sent. 200 The file was downloaded! Specify a name for it: > test_purpose_get.txt File saved on the hard drive! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 2 Enter id: > 7 The request was sent. 200 The file was downloaded! Specify a name for it: > test_purpose_get_id.txt File saved on the hard drive! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent. ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Server started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_newFile.txt The request was sent. 200 The file was downloaded! Specify a name for it: > test_purpose_get_after_restart.txt File saved on the hard drive! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 2 Enter id: > 7 The request was sent. 200 The file was downloaded! Specify a name for it: > test_purpose_get_by_id_after_restart.txt File saved on the hard drive! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent. ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m Server started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_newFile.txt The request was sent. 200 The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 2 Enter id: > 7 The request was sent. 200 The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent.
